title: Episode 245: Should We Fund Children or Institutions?
itunes:title: Episode 245: Should We Fund Children or Institutions?
description:
Corey DeAngelis, who has made himself the public gadfly of teachers unions, joins us to talk about how Americans’ attitudes about funding public schools changed with covid.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!
